code: export async function postLogin(email,password){const url="".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_API_SERVER_URL,"/api/login");console.log("email: "+email+"pw: "+password);const request={method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},credentials:"include",body:JSON.stringify({email:email,password:password})};const response=await fetch(url,request);return await response.json();}export async function getLogin(){const url="".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_API_SERVER_URL,"/api/login");const request={credentials:"include"};const response=await fetch(url,request);return await response.json();}export async function deleteLogin(){const url="".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_API_SERVER_URL,"/api/login");const request={methode:"DELETE",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},credentials:"include"};await fetch(url,request);}
